plot: Five friends agree to video blog 30 days of their lives while on heroin; life goes from bad to worse; heroin takes over every aspect of their life as we watch them tumble through the jagged rabbit hole.
plot_en: Five friends agree to video blog 30 days of their lives while on heroin; life goes from bad to worse; heroin takes over every aspect of their life as we watch them tumble through the jagged rabbit hole.
plot_es: Five friends agree to video blog 30 days of their lives while on heroin; life goes from bad to worse; heroin takes over every aspect of their life as we watch them tumble through the jagged rabbit hole.
title: #30Nods
